pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, June 23, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, June 23, 2017:

Boischatel, Quebec

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend celebrations for la Fête nationale du Québec in Boischatel.

Centre Sportif
160 des Grès Street
Boischatel, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:00 a.m. and present themselves at the main entrance

Saint-Augustin-de-Desmaures, Quebec

11:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend celebrations for la Fête nationale du Québec in Saint-Augustin-de-Desmaures

Parc du Millénaire
160 Jean-Juneau Street
Saint-Augustin-de-Desmaures, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:30 a.m. and present themselves to the entrance to the Alain-Grandbois Library at 160 Jean-Juneau Street

Sainte-Anne-de-la-Pérade, Quebec

2:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend celebrations for la Fête nationale du Québec in Sainte-Anne-de-la-Pérade.

Parc du Pont
8 Marcotte Street
Sainte-Anne-de-la-Pérade, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:00 p.m.

Trois-Rivières, Quebec

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend celebrations for la Fête nationale du Québec in Trois-Rivières.

Parc Terre-des-Loisirs
671 des Loisirs Street
Trois-Rivières, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:00 p.m.
